p: The δ 13C Vienna Pee Dee Belemnite (VPDB) standard of C16 short n-alkanes in Haiti decreased significantly (by 4‰) in the marlstone, reaching a minimum in the Ir layer ( Fig. 1 and Supplemental Table 1), which implies that a significant devastation of marine organisms occurred after the deposition of coarse ejecta and ended with the deposition of the Ir layer.
